about

To new beginnings.

September 28, 2014

Hi there !

I've just shifted from my earlier blog here. Though blogging on wordpress is quite easy and comfortable, I was always intrigued by blogs I came across hosted as *.github.io pages. I wanted to have one of my own.

Hence this blog. I've set it up using Jekyll and the template for the blog has been borrowed from Kevin Sornberger's blog site after very few modifications.

The true problem was importing all my posts from my previous wordpress blog - but that's for another day, maybe.

That's it for now. I'm sure I'll have lots to write once I get going. I'm still getting used to writing in markdown - maybe I'll start using one of those handy markdown editors everyone keeps talking about.
